items.title: Persuasion
items.content: Make a Charisma (Persuasion) check to convince someone to do something or believe something through logic, etiquette, or good-natured appeals.

items.title: Deception
items.content: Make a Charisma (Deception) check to convincingly hide the truth, either verbally or through your actions.

items.title: Intimidation
items.content: Make a Charisma (Intimidation) check to influence someone through overt threats, hostile actions, or physical violence.

items.title: Insight
items.content: Make a Wisdom (Insight) check to determine the true intentions of a creature, detect a lie, or predict someone's next action.

items.title: Performance
items.content: Use a Charisma (Performance) check to impress others with your musical talent, acting, storytelling, or other entertainment skills.

items.title: Gathering Information
items.content: Spend time asking questions at taverns, markets, or other public places to learn about recent events, rumors, or specific people. This typically involves Charisma checks.
